item.title: What is the command for changin into other npc and how to do owner spells
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Yea, so Bobmich if you dont have Pnpc add this


        if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 2) {
            try {
                int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

                if (newNPC <= 30000 && newNPC >= 0) {
                    npcId = newNPC;
                    isNpc = true;
                    updateRequired = true;
                    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                } else {
                    sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
            }
        }

Read full topic
